department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程藉由實際案例的分享，從軟體工程的歷史、過程的演進、專案的流程規劃、系統需求、風險管理、軟體設計架構、單元及自動化測試等等，使同學了解軟體開發的困難，並學習如何設計高品質與高效率的軟體。
goal.en:
This course aims to provide students with an understanding of the challenges in software development through the sharing of real-life cases. Topics covered include the history of software engineering, the evolution of processes, project scheduling, system requirements, risk management, software design architecture, unit testing and automation testing. By exploring these aspects, students will gain insights into the complexities of software development and
learn how to design software that is both high-quality and efficient.

outline.ch:
W1: Introduction (syllabus)
W2: CH1 Intro to Software Engineering
W3: CH2 Software Engineering History
W4: CH3 Traditional Software Processes
W5: CH4 Contemporary Software Processes
W6: CH6 Project Scheduling and Risk Management
W7: CH7 Software Requirements
W8: CH8 System Models
W9: CH9 Architectural Design
W10: CH10 Architectural Design Styles
W11: Midterm Report
W12: CH11 V＆amp;V (Verification ＆amp; Validation) State of ART Software Testing
W13: CH12 Modern Unit Testing Practice
W14: CH13 Program Understanding - Software System Knowledge Transfer
W15: CH14 Process Automation - DEVOPS，Git Branch Model，and Tools
W16: Final Report
W17: Holiday
W18: CH15 Static Analysis and Formal Development
